itemInfo.itemDesc: HP Steal +1 for 5 min.\n- Cooldown : 10 min.

item.name: Oil of Fortitude
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Oil of Fortitude
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Pure Powder Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Sky Mushroom
item.desc: A natural resource that can be used as an element for cooking, alchemy.\n - How to Obtain : Elric Shrine, from Sky Mushroom.\n â€» Direct use of this item will give you special buff but it might cause food poisoning at the same time!

item.name: Trace of Origin
item.desc: A material used for Crafting equipment.\nIt can be Excavated at Glish Ruins.

item.name: Monk's Branch
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. Monk's Branch requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained by Lumbering trees, but only rarely.
